org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

Class ThreadContextTransactionManager.TransactionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction.ThreadContextTransactionManager.TransactionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, TransactionScope
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadContextTransactionManager.AmbientThreadedTransactionScope, ThreadContextTransactionManager.NotSupportedTransaction
    Enclosing class:
    ThreadContextTransactionManager

    protected abstract class ThreadContextTransactionManager.TransactionBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransactionScope
    The base class for the different types of transactions handled by this transaction manager. The different implementations are dependent on the propagation level used when the transaction was opened.

      • getTransaction

        public Transaction getTransaction()

      • fireEvent

        protected void fireEvent(int event)

      • isCommitted

        public boolean isCommitted()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Returns true if the transaction scope has been committed.

        This refers to the entire transaction scope; if this transaction object was opened within a larger transaction scope, then calling TransactionScope.commit() on this object will not result in a commit and this will return false until the larger scope is committed.

        Specified by:
        isCommitted in interface TransactionScope
        Returns:
        true iff the entire ambient transaction successfully committed.

      • isReverted

        public boolean isReverted()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Returns true if the transaction scope has been reverted.

        If this transaction was propagated from a larger transaction scope (except by Propagation.NESTED), then this will return true if TransactionScope.revert() has been called on ANY transaction object participating in the transaction.

        Specified by:
        isReverted in interface TransactionScope
        Returns:
        true iff the entire ambient transaction was reverted.

      • putTransactionListener

        public void putTransactionListener(TransactionListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Adds a transaction listener for the ambient transaction, if it does not already exist.
        Specified by:
        putTransactionListener in interface TransactionScope
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add to the entire ambient transaction.

      • removeTransactionListener

        public void removeTransactionListener(TransactionListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Removes a transaction listener for the ambient transaction.
        Specified by:
        removeTransactionListener in interface TransactionScope
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove from the entire ambient transaction.

      • setRevertOnly

        public void setRevertOnly()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Sets the transaction to be "Revert Only". The transaction will continue as normal, but will throw an IllegalStateException if TransactionScope.commit() is called.
        Specified by:
        setRevertOnly in interface TransactionScope

      • getOptions

        public TransactionOptions getOptions()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Gets the options with which this transaction was opened.
        Specified by:
        getOptions in interface TransactionScope
        Returns:
        the TransactionOptions object provided when the transaction was opened.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionScope
        Closes the current transaction scope. If the transaction has yet to be committed or reverted, and the transaction is the last participant in the ambient transaction scope (i.e. the root scope), the entire transaction is reverted immediately.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface TransactionScope
